attributes.action: Increase pay for existing Nurses and Healthcare Workers
attributes.additional_details:
Nurses and Healthcare Assistants are our very frontline medical staff.  They are underpaid for the work they do and the responsibility they carry, especially with Covid-19 and the threat to their health in caring for others.  
The NHS is top-heavy with highly-paid Directors, Managers and CCG staff, counting beans.  I know money is wasted in these areas - I have seen it when I worked for the NHS and CCG
These are the staff who are going to treat the nation and they should be rewarded accordingly.
attributes.background: Nurses & Healthcare Workers must have a pay rise which truly reflects their status in our Healthcare.  These staff need salaries which reflect their professionalism, qualifications, experience, knowledge and training in a socialist role to acknowledge their accountability and personal responsibility

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for NHS healthcare workers and recognise their work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

Award all Nursing Staff in the NHS a pay rise of 10% backdated to 1 April 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316307
